participant_2.background:
I read fantasy novels to escape my reality.
I live in a small town in the Midwest where I can be myself and not be judged for my music taste or my dreams.
I broke my leg when I was a kid, but I'm all better now!
i work at a grocery store.
My thumbs are getting in the way of my typing, but I'm enjoying the peace and quiet of living by the lake.

content.text: Hi! What's your favorite fantasy novel?
The Hobbit! It's such a classic and the story is so heartwarming.
I love that book too! I've read it so many times.
Me too! It's one of my favorite books of all time.
What else do you like to read?
I also like to read science fiction and historical fiction.
Oh cool! I've never really been into historical fiction, but I love science fiction.
What are some of your favorite science fiction books?
I like the Ender's Game series by Orson Scott Card and the Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy by Douglas Adams.
I've heard good things about the Ender's Game series, but I haven't read it yet. I love the Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy! It's so funny.
It is! I've read it so many times and it always makes me laugh.
Me too! It's one of my favorite books to reread.
Have you seen the movie adaptation of the Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy?
Yes, I have! It was pretty good, but it didn't capture the same magic as the book.
I agree. The book is definitely better, but the movie was still enjoyable.
Definitely! It's a great movie to watch if you're a fan of the book.
